characters.name: Guard1
characters.quote: The food today taste great. You should go to the Kitchen and have some.

characters.name: Guard2
characters.quote: However you can't pass unless you have the proper guard uniform.

characters.name: Cook
characters.quote: I just finished mixing the ingredients for the poison. Take the bottle.

characters.name: Servant
characters.quote: Take the knife. You will need it.

characters.name: Guard4
characters.quote: At least we get so see outside from the big windows.

characters.name: Guard5
characters.quote: This shift feel like is never going to end.

characters.name: King's Hand
characters.quote: This is the 'key' to the Wizard's Foyer

characters.name: Monster
characters.quote: Nice!! Looks like my meal is ready. Come get closer.

characters.name: Evil Wizard
characters.quote: If you don't kill me we can make a deal. I can make you very powerful
